segments.text: But this place doesn't feel like a forty-ping apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's forty pings including the balcony . See . It's huge .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ! The view is great ! Mountains , fresh air ! Stars ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This balcony is perfect for barbecuing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And we could get a dog !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . No pets are allowed in this apartment building , except fish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , fish it will be then .
segments.speaker: S1
